description: View and manage Advanced Threat Protection settings for storage accounts.

commands.name: az security atp storage show
commands.summary: Display Advanced Threat Protection settings for a storage account.
examples: az security atp storage show --resource-group MyResourceGroup --storage-account MyStorageAccount

commands.name: az security atp storage update
commands.summary: Toggle status of Advanced Threat Protection for a storage account.
examples: az security atp storage update --resource-group MyResourceGroup --storage-account MyStorageAccount --is-enabled true
az security atp storage update --resource-group MyResourceGroup --storage-account MyStorageAccount --is-enabled false
